revised_title: Hyperfine Fields at Impurities in Metals: A Discussion on Ion Implantation and Interactions
tldr: This article discusses the hyperfine fields and interactions of dilute impurities in metals, focusing on rare earths, transition elements, and non-magnetic elements. The authors explore the crystal field mechanisms and exchange forces in ferromagnetic hosts, providing a comprehensive overview of the current understanding of hyperfine fields in various metal environments.
